name: Into the Darkness (MattBann)
description:
How To Play

You are an adventurer looking to challenge yourself by exploring an old cave, but this might be too dangerous of an adventure. Reach the deepest part of the cave, then return safely to the surface.

Each room has an unlit lantern. See if you can light all of them on your journey.

Controls
  • A/D - move left/right
  • Space - jump
  • Shift - dash
  • Mouse/arrow keys - point torch
  • R - restart level

To dash, you must be mid-air and pressing A/D. To wall jump, hang on to the wall with A/D and press space to jump away from it.

Credits

All visual assets by me

Music by SpringySpringo from opengameart.org

Sound effects from opengameart.org users: pauliuw, leohpaz, MentalSanityOff, JaggedStone, Independent.nu, qubodup
